amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for periodic census and programs by $110 million and increases funding for the COPS program (hiring and rehiring of additional career law enforcement officers) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for periodic census and programs by $110 million and to increase funding for community oriented policing services programs (hiring and rehiring of additional career law enforcement officers) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Reichert.
